divs: sighting detailsdear people, ufo sighting, looking for evidence, can you help? date; 11\ 9\ 2004 saterday, time; between six thirty to eight thirty in the morning place; england, burghfield, reading, berkshire.postcode rg30 3tg lat 51; 24; 40n ( 51.41116) long 1;02;26w ( -1,04053) someone somewhere got this evidence on vidieo is it you? any webb cams on this area? any radar evidence? any weather cams? any google earth cams? anyone got any ideas where else to look? thanks for your help, michael, 1 going home 2 size sky was light blue no clouds anywhere in sky stuck out 3 spaceship nearly crashed van asked wife what she 4rt it was said same 4 coloured lights trough middle clouds rushing through it no noise hovering 5 frightened scared at first then tried to collect as much information in my head about sighting 6 it moved off quickly into the sky lost sight of it after 3 miles
